title: Is anyone else having trouble with pingspikes lately?
body: It might be just my internet, I'm not sure. But I do know I'm getting real sick of everything going fine until a teamfight and then I get rubberbanded back into a veigar cage or something

replies.body: I wasn't sure which logs matched up to which games, so I just picked a random recent one. Looks like you're on the money about that packet loss though. I'll have to try some of those solutions listed http://prntscr.com/g57p6c

If you run into any problems or haven't been able to smooth out that packet loss yet, go ahead and hit up our techies in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)! They might be able to spot something in those network logs you used earlier that we can tweak to help out.

Sometimes that rubberbanding can be a preeeeetty good sign of packet loss, which would mean that part of your connection is getting damaged or lost along the way to our servers. 

I want to go ahead and test for that by using some League network logs from one of those games that had the rubberbanding. Let our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan it to see how your connection was looking during the match, take a screenshot using something like Gyazo, and paste it here so I can look over it with you!
